verbs.description: The comedian [V: is] drawing heat for directing a vulgarity at Ivanka Trump .
[ARG0: The comedian] is [V: drawing] [ARG1: heat] [ARGM-CAU: for directing a vulgarity at Ivanka Trump] .
[ARG0: The comedian] is drawing heat for [V: directing] [ARG1: a vulgarity] [ARG2: at Ivanka Trump] .
